body_html: Thanks for the suggestion. However, I don't think switching to tf.learn would really solve the issue. The hooks allow you to run a validation phase after a certain number of steps, which I can do well enough in my own code, but still rely on underlying queues to determine when the data is over. As a result, the limitation in the io utilities applies equally to them. (i.e. the lack of a method to read an epoch of data multiple times without rebuilding the graph).
